ModMetaData.name: Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)
ModMetaData.author: Emoryoakley (Exiler)
ModMetaData.description:
[b]Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)[/b] [i]Version: 1.5.20250406[/i] [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.zh.md]繁體中文說明[/url] | [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.md]English README[/url] [b]Introduction:[/b] This RimWorld mod introduces four new sizes for the vanilla geothermal generator: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, and 5x5. To enhance gameplay realism and provide customization options, the values for power output and resources required for construction are adjustable via the in-game settings menu. All other attributes, such as maximum hit points, work required to build, and necessary construction skill levels, are preset and consistent with the default values.
[b]How to Use:[/b] 1. Subscribe to or download this mod, and enable it in-game. 2. Complete the "Geothermal Power" research to unlock the new generator sizes. 3. Modify power output and resources required to suit your preferences through the mod settings menu.
Default specifications for each generator are as follows: [b]Mini Geothermal Generator (2x2)[/b] - Area: 4 Tiles - Power Output: 500 W - Power Efficiency: 125 W/Tile - Resources Required: 50 Steel, 2 Components - Maximum HP: 75 - Work Required: 1500 - Construction Skill Level: 2
[b]Light Geothermal Generator (3x3)[/b] - Area: 9 Tiles - Power Output: 1000 W - Power Efficiency: 111.1 W/Tile - Resources Required: 120 Steel, 3 Components - Maximum HP: 175 - Work Required: 3500 - Construction Skill Level: 3
[b]Medium Geothermal Generator (4x4)[/b] - Area: 16 Tiles - Power Output: 1800 W - Power Efficiency: 112.5 W/Tile - Resources Required: 200 Steel, 5 Components - Maximum HP: 300 - Work Required: 6000 - Construction Skill Level: 5
[b]High-Efficiency Geothermal Generator (5x5)[/b] - Area: 25 Tiles - Power Output: 2700 W - Power Efficiency: 108 W/Tile - Resources Required: 300 Steel, 7 Components - Maximum HP: 450 - Work Required: 9000 - Construction Skill Level: 7
[b]Geothermal Generator (6x6) (Vanilla)[/b] - Area: 36 Tiles - Power Output: 3600 W - Power Efficiency: 100 W/Tile - Resources Required: 340 Steel, 8 Components - Maximum HP: 500 - Work Required: 12000 - Construction Skill Level: 8
[b]Languages:[/b] This mod includes translations for: - Traditional Chinese (繁體中文) - Simplified Chinese (简体中文) - English
Feel free to create and share your own language translation mods to extend compatibility.
[b]Compatibility and Notes:[/b] - This mod is incompatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]. - You can still enable both this mod and the Geothermal Power Extenders mod in the game at the same time. - But the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url] mod adds an extension building, which requires placement next to a geothermal generator. However, this extension building cannot be placed next to the four new geothermal generators added by this mod. - For additional details, please refer to the [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator]GitHub repository[/url].
